name: Yann Dall'Aglio: Love -- you're doing it wrong
description: In this delightful talk, philosopher Yann Dallâ€™Aglio explores the universal search for tenderness and connection in a world that's ever more focused on the individual. As it turns out, it's easier than you think. A wise and witty reflection on the state of love in the modern age. (Filmed at TEDxParis.)
